sentence.text: While control subjects with high PGC-1α expression exhibited high PV and neurofilament bundle assembly expression, schizophrenia subjects with high PGC-1α expression did not, suggesting dissociation between PGC-1α expression and these targets in schizophrenia.

Interestingly, the positive correlation between PGC-1α and PV, positive regulation of dendrite extension, or Cplx1 expression was lost in schizophrenia patients with low NRF-1 expression, suggesting that NRF-1 is a critical predictor of these genes in disease.
